sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, Suspense } from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import { SunIcon, MoonIcon, LanguageIcon, BriefcaseIcon, AcademicCapIcon, SparklesIcon, CodeBracketIcon, LinkIcon, RocketLaunchIcon, ChatBubbleLeftRightIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; // Placeholder for 3D elements or visual flourishes const FloatingShape = ({ className }) => (
); function App() { const { t, i18n } = useTranslation(); const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = useState(() => { const savedMode = localStorage.getItem('darkMode'); return savedMode ? JSON.parse(savedMode) : true; // Dark mode is default }); useEffect(() => { if (darkMode) { document.documentElement.classList.add('dark'); } else { document.documentElement.classList.remove('dark'); } localStorage.setItem('darkMode', JSON.stringify(darkMode)); }, [darkMode]); const toggleDarkMode = () => setDarkMode(!darkMode); const changeLanguage = (lng) => { i18n.changeLanguage(lng); }; const currentLanguage = i18n.language; const linkedinProfileUrl = "https://www.linkedin.com/in/joaopedrolopesgoncalves/"; const githubProfileUrl = "https://github.com/DevJpLg"; const technipFmcLogoUrl = "/images/technipfmc.svg"; // Ensure this path is correct const profilePhotoUrl = "/images/profile.jpg"; // Path to your profile photo // Placeholder for actual projects from GitHub const projectsPlaceholder = [ { id: 1, title: "GitHub Project 1", description: "Description for project 1 from GitHub.", tech: ["React", "Node.js"], image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300x200/FF00FF/FFFFFF?Text=Project+1", link: "#" }, { id: 2, title: "GitHub Project 2", description: "Description for project 2 from GitHub.", tech: ["Python", "API"], image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300x200/00A9FF/FFFFFF?Text=Project+2", link: "#" }, ]; return (
{t('hero.name')} {/* Display full name from translation */}
{/* Hero Section - Remains as is */}

{t('hero.greeting')} {t('hero.name')}

{t('hero.title')}

{t('hero.subtitle')}

{t('hero.ctaButton')} {t('hero.linkedinProfile')}
{/* About Me Section (Type 1 - Redesigned) */}

{t('about.title')}

{t('about.intro')}

{t('about.paragraph1')}

{t('about.paragraph2')}

{t('about.location')}

{t('about.connections')}

{/* Skills Section (Type 2 - Moved) */}

{t('skills.title')}

{t('skills.mainSkillsTitle')}

  • {t('skills.programmingLanguages')}
  • {t('skills.dataAnalysis')}
  • {t('skills.devTools')}
  • {t('skills.dbManagement')}

{t('skills.professionalStrengthsTitle')}

{t('skills.strengths', { returnObjects: true }).map((skill, index) => ( {skill} ))}

{t('skills.topSkillsTitle')}

{t('skills.topSkillsList', { returnObjects: true }).map((skill, index) => ( {skill} ))}
{/* Experience Section (Type 2) */}

{t('experience.title')}

{t('experience.technipfmc.role')}

{t('experience.technipfmc.company')}

{t('experience.technipfmc.duration')}

{t('experience.technipfmc.location')}

{t('experience.technipfmc.description')}

{t('experience.technipfmc.skills')}

{/* Education Section (Type 1) */}

{t('education.title')}

{t('education.iff.institution')}

{t('education.iff.degree')}

{t('education.iff.period')}

{t('education.iff.skills')}

{t('education.cnsdl.institution')}

{t('education.cnsdl.degree')}

{t('education.cnsdl.period')}

{/* Featured Section (Type 1) */}

{t('featured.title')}

{t('featured.technipfmcPost.title')}

"{t('featured.technipfmcPost.text')}"

{t('featured.technipfmcPost.hashtags')}

{t('featured.technipfmcPost.engagement')}

{t('featured.excelCertificatePost.title')}

"{t('featured.excelCertificatePost.text')}"

{t('featured.excelCertificatePost.engagement')}

{/* Licenses & Certifications Section (Type 2) */}
{/* Added overflow-hidden to section to contain horizontal scroll */}

{/* Ou use Bootstrap Icon */} {t('certifications.title')}

{/* Container para a lista de certificados com rolagem horizontal */}
{t('certifications.certificates', { returnObjects: true }).map((cert, index) => (

{cert.name}

{cert.issuer}

{cert.date}

ID: {cert.credentialId}

{/* mt-auto para empurrar skills e link para baixo */}

Skills:

{cert.skills.map(skill => ( {skill} ))}
{t('certifications.showCredentialText')}
))}
{/* Projects Section (Type 1) */}

{t('projects.title')}

{t('projects.description')}

{projectsPlaceholder.map((project) => (

{project.title}

{project.description}

{project.tech.map(tech => ( {tech} ))}
View Details →
))}
See more on GitHub
{/* Contact Section (Type 2) */}

{t('contact.title')}

{t('contact.description')}

{t('contact.linkedin')}

{t('footer.text')}

); } export default function SuspendedApp() { return ( Loading translations...}> ); }
